title: Is the Meme "Better nerf Irelia"
body: Preventing her from ever getting nerfed now?

replies.body:
It switched to 'Better nerf Sona'

And everyone is focusing on the jungle and current PBE changes. If she gets changed there, everyone will be up in arms that she either doesn't or does need said change (or both because this place is weird).
I bet Rito freaked out from the first person that told them that. Thus the 5.3 changes.
